name: Arcane Fists
summary: Your physical training encompasses unarmed combat forms.

name: Familiar
summary: You make a pact with a creature that serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Magus's Analysis
summary: You make an assessment informed by your knowledge of how a creature fights.

name: Raise a Tome
summary: You raise up the book you're holding and flip it open to defend yourself and expedite your studies.

name: Cantrip Expansion
trait: Bard, Cleric, Magus, Oracle, Psychic, Sorcerer, Witch, Wizard
summary: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Enhanced Familiar
trait: Druid, Magus, Sorcerer, Thaumaturge, Witch, Wizard
summary: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Expansive Spellstrike
summary: You've adapted a wider array of spells to work with your attacks.

name: Force Fang
summary: You can turn your attack into an unerring blur of force.

name: Spell Parry
summary: You infuse magical power into your body or armaments to parry both physical and magical assaults.

name: Spirit Sheath
summary: You've magically constructed an extradimensional sheath for your weapon that you access through your clothing, typically through a pocket, sleeve, or seam.

name: Devastating Spellstrike
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study, Spellstrike
summary: Your Spellstrike sweeps are so wide and devastating, they splash onto nearby foes.

name: Distracting Spellstrike
summary: You weave distracting magic with one hand to enhance your Spellstrike.

name: Emergency Targe
summary: You immediately Raise a Shield or cast _shield_.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 185</row>
trait: Bard, Champion, Cleric, Druid, Magus, Monk, Oracle, Psychic, Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Starlit Eyes
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, starlit span hybrid study
summary: Starlight shines in your sight, enhancing your perception and range.

name: Steady Spellcasting (Magus)
summary: Confident in your technique, you don't easily lose your concentration when you Cast a Spell.

name: Striker's Scroll
summary: You can attach a scroll to your weapon or _handwraps of mighty blows_ to blend its spell into an attack, carefully folding it around a part of the weapon or sealing it to the weapon's surface.

name: Student of the Staff
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, twisting tree hybrid study
summary: You've studied the staff extensively to learn the hidden capabilities of your chosen weapon.

name: Attack of Opportunity
summary: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Cascade Countermeasure
summary: When in Arcane Cascade, you can make yourself resistant to magic.

name: Knowledge is Power
summary: When you critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check about a creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the creature, to your AC against its next attack roll, and to your save against its next effect requiring a save.

name: Shielded Tome
summary: During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse a shield into your favorite book, where it appears as an elaborate bookmark.

name: Capture Magic
summary: When you resist a spell, you capture some of its magic for your own use.

name: Fused Staff
summary: When you prepare a staff, you can hold it up to a weapon to merge the two items.

name: Runic Impression
summary: You can temporarily replicate the effects of a property rune for your weapon or unarmed attacks.

name: Spell Swipe
summary: You attack in an arc and enact your spell against everyone you hit.

name: Standby Spell
summary: You've honed one spell as your favored combat technique, and you've practiced it enough that you no longer need to prepare it to cast it.

name: Cascading Ray
summary: Magical energy spills out to extend beyond the creature you struck.

name: Dazzling Block
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, sparkling targe hybrid study
summary: When you use Shield Block, you can create a flash of brilliant, multicolored light in a 15-foot cone.

name: Dimensional Disappearance
prerequisite: _dimensional assault_ focus spell, laughing shadow hybrid study
summary: You take advantage of teleportation to better hide your position.

name: Lunging Spellstrike
summary: Your spell unwinds the structure of your staff to make it exceptionally long, or even separate it into shards held together by magical power.

name: Meteoric Spellstrike
summary: A trail of energy flows from your target back to you.

name: Rapid Recharge
summary: You tap into an arcane trick to recover your ability to meld spells and attacks.

name: Sustaining Steel
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study
summary: You pull magic into your weapon, using its substance to transform the magic into restorative energy.

name: Conflux Focus
summary: You imagine how you'll weave magic and combat into future battles, improving your focus.

name: Magic Sense
trait: Arcane, Detection, Magus, Oracle, Sorcerer, Wizard
summary: You have a literal sixth sense for ambient magic in your vicinity.

name: Overwhelming Spellstrike
summary: You pierce through your foe's resistance.

name: Arcane Shroud
summary: Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast.

name: Hasted Assault
summary: You can speed yourself up to move and attack more swiftly.

name: Preternatural Parry
summary: You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second.

name: Dispelling Spellstrike
summary: The spell you deliver tries to force out magic affecting your enemy.

name: Resounding Cascade
summary: When you enter your Arcane Cascade, you disperse the magical reinforcement to nearby allies.

name: Conflux Wellspring
summary: You've achieved perfect magical and physical balance, allowing magic to flow into and through you more easily.

name: Versatile Spellstrike
summary: You can channel the entire realm of possibilities of your spellbook into an attack.

name: Supreme Spellstrike
summary: You've made it almost effortless to combine spells and attacks.

name: Whirlwind Spell
summary: You combine the might of a multitarget spell with a whirling flurry of attacks.
